OAuth

Some services are protected via OAuth. To be enabled to use OAuth to access these services, you must first register as a consumer. Once registered, the following information is used to correctly exercise the OAuth API:

Request Token URL: /oauth/request_token
Access Token URL: /oauth/access_token
User Confirmation Entry Point: /oauth/confirm_access
